>
[Greater Merciful Elixir](/Feats.aspx?ID=117) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 80 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Merciful Elixir](/Feats.aspx?ID=111)

</column>

---

Your additives contain panaceas that can remedy a plethora of maladies. When you use [Merciful Elixir](/Feats.aspx?ID=111), your elixir can instead attempt to counteract the blinded, deafened, sickened, or slowed condition.
